items.title: Trump administration eyes USAID money to advance America First goals
items.description: A State Department plan to reallocate close to $2 billion in foreign aid marks the latest challenge to Congress’ authority over federal spending.

items.title: In Wisconsin swing district, criticism of Charlie Kirk sparks backlash
items.description: The tensions coursing through the country have been on stark display, as a teacher and two city council members face a backlash over their words.
